summary: An email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding media inquiries about the Epstein case, specifically asking whether Victim-1 was interviewed by the Southern District of Florida and whether charging victims/defendants with obstruction was considered.

persons.name: Victim-1
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a media inquiry regarding whether they were interviewed by the Southern District of Florida in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: ABC News was making inquiries about the Epstein case in February 2020.
The inquiry asked whether Victim-1 had been interviewed by the Southern District of Florida.
The inquiry also asked whether charging victims/defendants with obstruction and having them proffer publicly was a consideration.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was aware of the inquiry but stated they would not comment.
